Customizing metadata¶

So you want different fields of metadata, do you? That’s easy enough. The metadata fields are controlled by the METADATA_FORM.

Creating the metadata form¶

There is no trick to the metadata form. It is a standard Django Form. The default form looks like:

class MetadataForm(forms.Form):
    page_id = forms.CharField(required=False)
    title = forms.CharField(required=False)
    description = forms.CharField(required=False)
    image = forms.CharField(required=False)
    keywords = forms.CharField(required=False)
    author = forms.CharField(required=False)
